hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that something wonderful happens when playing the Song of Storms after planting a magic bean.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #4# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #the Sun's Song#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Mirror Shield#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Did you know that the Kokiri Sword is as effective as Deku Sticks against Dead Hand?

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #the Mask of Truth#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Kokiri Sword#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Second Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.
